data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The proposed package facilitates the generation of Encapsulated
    Postscript Images with the aid of a couple of methods.

    Contrary to Postscript::Simple is allows creating complete
    Encapsulated Postscript Files.

    It is 'open' in two ways: 1) Any Postscript code can be included
    using the method 'rawcode' 2) Any non defined method is translated
    into the respective Postscript command (using AUTOLOAD); works also
    with parameters
